Projects.title: Invoice Sync
desc: Invoice Sync is a modern invoice management web application built for small businesses to simplify billing, payment tracking, and client communication.
Developed with Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Prisma ORM, and PostgreSQL, it enables users to create, send, and manage invoices efficiently with automatic status tracking and PDF export.
The app includes secure authentication with NextAuth, role-based access, and analytics dashboards displaying revenue trends and outstanding payments.

Projects.title: AI Resume Analyzer
desc: AI Resume Analyzer is an intelligent resume analysis platform that uses NLP and ML models to evaluate candidate resumes for ATS optimization and job fit.
It scores resumes based on keyword density, formatting, and skill match, providing actionable feedback to improve hiring outcomes.
The platform integrates OpenAI GPT models and scikit-learn pipelines for recommendation logic and was built using Flask, React, and Python.

Projects.title: Portfolio Website v2
desc: My second personal portfolio website built with Next.js 14 App Router, Tailwind CSS, and Framer Motion.
It showcases my projects, resume, and GitHub activity through real-time integrations. Optimized for SEO and performance with responsive animations and dynamic routing.
Includes dark/light mode, a contact form powered by Resend API, and a CMS-driven project management system.

Projects.title: TaskPilot
desc: TaskPilot is a productivity and team collaboration web app for managing projects and tasks with real-time sync and Kanban board support.
Built using React, Firebase, and Zustand, it provides task assignment, notifications, and role-based workspaces.
Implements offline persistence with IndexedDB and modern UI transitions using Framer Motion.

Projects.title: Blogify AI
desc: Blogify AI is a full-stack AI-powered content generation platform that transforms topics into SEO-ready blog posts using GPT-4 and Markdown formatting.
Users can create, edit, and publish posts, with cloud image upload and AI-assisted tagging.
The app was developed with Next.js, Prisma, PostgreSQL, and the OpenAI API, and includes an integrated text editor with syntax highlighting.

Projects.title: SmartVision â€“ Object Detection App
desc: SmartVision is a computer vision application that identifies and labels real-world objects from a live webcam feed using TensorFlow.js and YOLOv8.
It was designed to be educational, interactive, and runs entirely in the browser without server-side dependencies.

Projects.title: EduSphere LMS
desc: EduSphere is a learning management system (LMS) that supports course creation, quiz generation, and progress tracking.
Built using Laravel, MySQL, and Bootstrap, it features an admin dashboard, student progress tracking, and automated certificate generation.

Projects.title: Portfolio v1 (Legacy)
desc: My first personal portfolio website built with React and Tailwind CSS. It served as the foundation for my modern design and component organization approach.
Includes project showcases, responsive design, and scroll animations powered by AOS.
